item.title: Best Motorcycles under 5 Lakhs Onroad Price Bangalore
item.description: Planning to buy a powerful motorcycle under 5 lakhs? Royal Enfield GT 650 Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 Find all Interceptore variants list The price of Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 basic version is Rs ₹360500 (On-road price Bangalore) PURE : ₹5,80,000 ADVENTURE : ₹6,80,000 Kawasaki Ninja Benelli TRK 250 Triumph Tiger
